_header: Hail my Lord in whom I leve
_description: A prayer at the ‘leuacion’ — eight lines

HerefordO414.First Lines:
Eyl my lord in wom ich leueSothfastliche god &
                    man…
HerefordO414.Last Lines:
…þou make me in trouþe trewo& graunte me þi
                    blisse Amen
HerefordO414.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Levation Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         40 (1942): 131-46: 137.
